resources.string: Do you want to buy a 20 minute time-waster for 1 Aura? This purchase will lift off all restrictions from this app or item for the next 20 minutes.
You have 0 Aura to waste time, perform a quest to earn Aura now!
Are you sure you want to continue wasting your time?
Accessibilty Services required to run blockers.
This app requires overlay permission to display warning screen each time when a blocked item is found on screen. Your data always remains on your device and we do not store any of it on our servers
Notification permission required to receive quest updates.
Precise Location permission required to track location for this quest. Your data always remains on your device and we do not store any of it on our servers
Camera permission required to track position and count reps for this quest. Your data always remains on your device and we do not store any of it on our servers.

DigiPaws is an open-source Android productivity utility designed to help users reduce screen addiction by regulating app usage through a gamified experience. The application offers three distinct modesâ€”Easy, Adventure, and Hardâ€”each with unique features and challenges to promote healthy screen time habits.

In Easy Mode, DigiPaws provides gentle reminders to help you manage your screen time. When you attempt to access a blocked app, a warning screen appears. If you choose to proceed, a cooldown period starts. After the cooldown, another warning is displayed to remind you of your usage.

Adventure Mode introduces a gamified experience to control screen time. To access a blocked app, you need Aura. These can be earned by completing quests such as a quick 1 km walk. Each Aura grants 20 minutes of usage time for any blocked app, encouraging physical activity and mindful screen use. With every quests you perform, the difficulty rises.

Hard Mode offers the most stringent control over app usage. In this mode, when you try to open a blocked app, the back button is automatically pressed without any warning or cooldown, preventing access entirely.
What do you wish to block?
Supported Platforms: Youtube, Instagram, Revanced, Tiktok.

#TechRehab is a 3-week productivity challenge designed to help you break free from screen addiction. During this time, you wonâ€™t be able to modify the app or uninstall DigiPaws. To join the challenge, check the box labeled "Enable Device Admin" above.This step is optional. You can skip this step and enable it anytime in the future.
Specify a custom cooldown between each warning. This is unavailable for Adventure mode
Please turn off and re-enable if service malfunctions. To apply any configuration changes, turn off and on.
Select the apps you wish to block or receive usage warnings for.
Select the apps you wish to use during focus mode. Focus mode is a quest where one cannot access any non-whitelisted application for a desired time period. This quest cannot be stopped once started.
act as a quest and modify Aura count?
Move out of the above red zone to win this quest. There is no penalty for failing this quest. Do not forget to carry your phone!
Simply perform $valuex squats to earn 1 Aura point. You are free to perform this quest in sets of any.Make sure your entire body is visible on camera above. Not working?
Simply perform $valuex pushups to earn 1 Aura point. You are free to perform this quest in sets of any. Make sure your entire body is visible on camera above. Not working?

Focus or survival mode blocks all apps except basic needs like calling and SMS for the next 90 minutes. Once focus mode is turned on, it CANNOT be turned off until the timer goes off. Completing this quest brings 1 Aura coin.
By continuing, you agree to our Terms and Conditions

DigiPaws needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets DigiPaws block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions. \n\n Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your deviceâ€”we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.
To ensure this app works properly, please disable battery optimization for this app. This helps us gently remind you of your screen time, keeping you mindful and focused without being intrusive.
Congrats on conquering #TechRehab! Your 21 days of commitment are truly inspiring. Keep shining! ðŸŒŸ
